name: Best Grilled Vegetable Sandwich
author: Suzy729
summary: A delicious vegetarian sandwich made with freshly grilled zucchini, eggplant, red bell pepper, fresh mozzarella, plum tomato, and basil pesto in a whole-grain baguette.
ingredients: ½  zucchini, cut crosswise into 1/2-inch slices
½ small eggplant, cut crosswise into 1/2-inch slices
1 small whole-grain baguette, cut into two halves and split lengthwise
directions: Combine zucchini, eggplant, and red bell pepper in a bowl
Set aside to allow the vegetables to tenderize, at least 3 hours
Preheat grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate
Brush vegetables with olive oil to coat; season with black pepper
Cook vegetables on hot grill until tender, 2 to 3 minutes per side
Transfer to a bowl and set aside
Toast cut sides of baguette in a toaster oven until golden brown, 2 to 3 minutes
Spread basil pesto evenly over toasted surface
Arrange grilled vegetables evenly onto 2 of the baguette halves
Top each with sliced mozzarella and plum tomato slices; top sandwich with the remaining baguette pieces to serve
